message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $950000 for the product. This is a special offer tailored to your needs and expectations. I look forward to your consideration.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer. I am willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this price is fair, taking into account its value to me and the market price. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of this, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $925000 for the product. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product to you and my desire to maintain a positive business relationship. I look forward to your response.

Dear Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. After re-evaluating the value of the product, I am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $912500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that balances the value of the product with my budget. I look forward to your response.
